code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';export const useFetchData=url=>{const[data,setData]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);try{const response=await fetch(url);if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to fetch data');}const result=await response.json();setData(result);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[url]);return{data,loading,error};};
